Meta.title: WheelX - The Ultimate Motorcycle Community App
Meta.description: The ultimate app for bikers. GPS navigation, real-time group tracking, events and a global community of riders.
Meta.keywords: motorcycle, biker, GPS, navigation, community, group ride, events, SOS, safety, maintenance

Hero.title: Elevate Your
Hero.description: The ultimate app for bikers. Optimized GPS navigation, real-time group tracking, event organization, and a global community of riders.

Features.title: Everything a
Features.description: WheelX combines navigation, community and safety in a single app designed by and for bikers.

gps.title: Moto GPS Navigation
gps.desc: Optimized routes for motorcycles: twisty, scenic, rural. GPX Import/Export and offline mode.

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.desc: Locate your friends on the map in real-time. Perfect for group rides.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Share your adventures, join groups and connect with riders from all over the world.

events.title: Events
events.desc: Organize and participate in rides, road-trips, meetups and bike races.

sos.title: SOS Safety
sos.desc: Automatic fall detection, SOS button and alerts to your emergency contacts.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Log
maintenance.desc: Manage your bike maintenance: oil changes, tires, brakes. Automatic reminders included.

HowItWorks.title: How it
HowItWorks.description: In 3 steps, shift to second and join the pack.

step1.title: Install the Gear
step1.desc: Download the app on your store. It's free, it's fast.

step2.title: Set Up Your Bike
step2.desc: Create your profile, add your bike. You're ready to hit the road.

step3.title: Gas!
step3.desc: Discover routes, join groups. Ride safe.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about WheelX

items.question: Is WheelX free?
items.answer: Yes! WheelX is free with all basic features. A Premium version will be available for advanced features.

items.question: Which platforms is WheelX available on?
items.answer: WheelX is available on iOS and Android. Download the app on the App Store or Google Play Store.

items.question: How does group tracking work?
items.answer: Create or join a ride, and follow the position of all participants in real-time on the map. Perfect for never losing your group!

items.question: Does offline mode work?
items.answer: Yes! Download your maps in advance to navigate even without an internet connection. Ideal for remote areas.

items.question: How does fall detection work?
items.answer: The app uses your phone's sensors to detect falls. An alert is automatically sent to your emergency contacts with your GPS position.

DownloadCTA.title: Ready to
DownloadCTA.description: Download WheelX for free and start exploring the world on two wheels with thousands of riders.

Footer.tagline: The ultimate platform for bikers. Explore, connect, ride.

Contact.title: Get in
Contact.description: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Your Name
form.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using WheelX, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

usage.title: 2. Use License
usage.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the WheelX app for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

safety.title: 3. Rider Safety
safety.content: WheelX is a navigation and community tool. Always prioritize road safety, follow local traffic laws, and never use the app while operating your motorcycle in a way that distracts you.

data.title: 1. Data Collection
data.content: We collect location data to provide GPS navigation, group tracking, and SOS features. This data is only collected when you use these features.

sharing.title: 2. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. Location data for group rides is only shared with the members of the ride you have joined.

security.title: 3. Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information and ensure your ride data remains private.
